ruler_botton_placeholder = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {

    }
}

ruler_botton_check_scope_is_country = {
    potential = {
        NOT = {
            is_scope_type = country
        }

    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {

    }
}

ruler_is_regular_empire_effect = {
    potential = {
        NOT = {
            has_ethic = ethic_gestalt_consciousness
        }
    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {
        
    }
}

ruler_is_hive_mind_effect = {
    potential = {
        has_ethic = ethic_gestalt_consciousness
        has_authority = auth_hive_mind
    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {
        
    }
}

ruler_is_machine_effect = {
    potential = {
        has_ethic = ethic_gestalt_consciousness
        has_authority = auth_machine_intelligence
    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {
        
    }
}

ruler_auto_unlock_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        NOT = {
            has_country_flag = rls_auto_unlock_enabled
        }
    }
    allow = {
        always = yes
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = rls_auto_unlock_desc
        custom_tooltip = rls_to_enable
        hidden_effect = {
            set_country_flag = rls_auto_unlock_enabled
        }
    }
}

ruler_auto_unlock_button_enabled_effect = {
    potential = {
        has_country_flag = rls_auto_unlock_enabled
    }
    allow = {
        always = yes
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = rls_auto_unlock_desc
        custom_tooltip = rls_auto_unlock_enabled_tooltip
        custom_tooltip = rls_to_disable
        hidden_effect = {
            remove_country_flag = rls_auto_unlock_enabled
        }
    }
}

ruler_min_window_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        NOT = {
            has_country_flag = rls_no_event_popup
        }
    }
    allow = {
        always = yes
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = rls_min_window_desc
        custom_tooltip = rls_to_enable
        hidden_effect = {
            set_country_flag = rls_no_event_popup
        }
    }
}

ruler_min_window_button_enalbed_effect = {
    potential = {
        has_country_flag = rls_no_event_popup
    }
    allow = {
        always = yes
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = rls_min_window_desc
        custom_tooltip = rls_to_disable
        hidden_effect = {
            remove_country_flag = rls_no_event_popup
        }
    }
}

ruler_hobby_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
		if = {
            limit = {
                NOR = {
                    has_authority = auth_hive_mind
                    has_authority = auth_machine_intelligence
                    has_authority = auth_ancient_machine_intelligence
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = tab_ruler_hobbies_tooltip
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                OR = {
                    has_authority = auth_hive_mind
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = tab_ruler_hobbies_tooltip_hivemind
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                OR = {
                    has_authority = auth_machine_intelligence
                    has_authority = auth_ancient_machine_intelligence
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = tab_ruler_hobbies_tooltip_machine
        }
		custom_tooltip = {
			fail_text = play_as_ruler.9499.tooltip2
			hidden_trigger = {
				any_owned_leader = {
					is_ruler = yes
					has_leader_flag = play_as_ruler_ruler_itself
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			fail_text = play_as_ruler.9499.tooltip3
			hidden_trigger = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = ruler_hobby_view_opened
				}	
			}
		}
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = tab_ruler_hobbies_tooltip
        hidden_effect = {
            set_country_flag = ruler_hobby_view_opened
            if = {
                limit = {
                    always = yes
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.42689
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

close_hobby_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        always = yes
    }
    effect = {
        hidden_effect = {
            remove_country_flag = ruler_hobby_view_opened
        }
    }
}

ruler_botton_rls_convert_execution_into_idea = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_prefix
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_execution_into_idea
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
            NOT = {
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_rls_event_303_is_opened
            NOT = {
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.303.opened
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler.301_fail_tooltip
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                    value >= 5
                }
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_rls_too_many_idea_point
            leader = {
                NOT = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 15
                    }
                }
                
            }
        }
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_prefix
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_execution_into_idea
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_tooltip
        hidden_effect = {
            country_event = { 
                id = play_as_ruler.301
            }
        }
    }
}

ruler_botton_rls_convert_idea_into_execution = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_prefix
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_idea_into_execution
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
            NOT = {
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_rls_event_303_is_opened
            NOT = {
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.303.opened
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler.302_fail_tooltip
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                    value >= 5
                }
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_rls_too_many_execution_point
            leader = {
                NOT = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 15
                    }
                }
                
            }
        }
       
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_prefix
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_idea_into_execution
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_convert_tooltip
        hidden_effect = {
            country_event = { 
                id = play_as_ruler.302
            }
        }
    }
}

ruler_hobby_botton_big_circle_fx_when_favor_category = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
        OR = {
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_recycle_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_growth_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_investor_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_trade_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_builder_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_miner_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_goods_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_intel_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_influence_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_edict_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_unity_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_researcher_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_researcher_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_physics_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_society_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_engineering_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_ship_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_army_favored
                }
            }
            AND = {
                has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_favored
                }
            }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        
    }
    effect = {
        
    }
}

###agrarian###
    

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_main_botton_selected = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
        }
        allow = {
        }
        effect = {
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_favor_enabled_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_agrarian_1_1_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_agrarian_selected
            
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_1_1_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 2
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_agrarian_1_1_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_1_1_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_1_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 2
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

                    leader = {

        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_agrarian_1_4_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_4_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

#############
###recycle###
#############

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_recycle_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_recycle_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_recycle_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored

    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_recycle_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_recycle_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_recycle_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_recycle_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_recycle_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_recycle_4_5_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_4_5_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_recycle_4_5_enabled_effect = {

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_growth_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_growth_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_growth_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_growth_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_growth_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_growth_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {

            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_growth_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_growth_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_growth_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_growth_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_growth_3_3_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_growth_selected
            
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_growth_3_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_blank
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_growth_3_2_selected
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_growth_3_3_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_growth_3_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_3_3_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###investor###
#############

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_investor_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_investor_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_investor_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_investor_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_investor_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
        }

            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_main_botton_desc

            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_investor_main_botton_selected = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected
        }
        allow = {
        }
        effect = {
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_investor_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_investor_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_investor_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_investor_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_investor_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        value >= 4
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_investor_1_5_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_investor_1_5_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_5_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_trade_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_trade_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_trade_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_trade_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_trade_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_trade_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_trade_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_trade_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_trade_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_trade_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_trade_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_trade_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                set_country_flag = rls_1_3_selected

                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_builder_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_builder_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_builder_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_builder_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_builder_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_builder_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_builder_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_builder_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_builder_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_builder_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_builder_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_builder_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                    has_leader_flag = rls_builder_1_7_selected
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_builder_1_8_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_builder_1_8_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_8_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###miner###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_miner_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_miner_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_miner_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_miner_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects

            has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected

                has_leader_flag = rls_miner_favored

        }

        }

        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_miner_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_miner_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_miner_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_miner_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                has_leader_flag = rls_miner_3_3_selected
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_3_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_miner_3_4_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_miner_selected
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_3_4_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_blank
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_miner_3_3_selected
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 4
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_miner_3_4_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_miner_3_4_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_3_4_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###alloy###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_alloy_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_alloy_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects

        }

        }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_alloy_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_alloy_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_alloy_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_2_1_selected
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 2
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_alloy_2_2_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_alloy_2_2_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_2_2_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 2
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###goods###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_goods_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_goods_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_goods_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_goods_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_goods_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_goods_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_goods_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_goods_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects

            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_goods_favored

        }
        allow = {
        }
        effect = {
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_goods_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_goods_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_goods_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_goods_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_goods_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_goods_1_4_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_goods_1_4_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_4_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_intel_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_intel_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_intel_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_intel_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_intel_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_intel_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_intel_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_intel_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_intel_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_intel_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_intel_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_intel_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_intel_2_5_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_intel_2_5_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_2_5_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###influence###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_influence_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_influence_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_influence_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_influence_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_influence_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_influence_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_influence_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 4
                    }
                }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_influence_3_1_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_influence_selected
        }
        allow = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    is_gestalt = no
                }
                custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_3_1_desc
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    is_gestalt = yes
                }
                custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_3_1_swap_desc
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 2
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_influence_3_1_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    is_gestalt = no
                }
                custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_3_1_desc
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    is_gestalt = yes
                }
                custom_tooltip = rls_direction_influence_3_1_swap_desc
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_3_1_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 2
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_edict_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_edict_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_edict_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_edict_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_edict_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_edict_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_edict_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_edict_main_botton_favored_and_selected = { #Same as above but with icon effects and no it won't take effects

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_edict_main_botton_selected = {

        }

        }

        }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_edict_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_edict_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_edict_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_edict_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_edict_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_5_1_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 2
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_edict_dunno_terraform
                has_technology = tech_terrestrial_sculpting
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_edict_6_1_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_edict_6_1_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {

                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3

                }
            }
        }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_unity_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_unity_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_unity_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_unity_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_unity_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_unity_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_unity_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea

                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {

                fail_text = rls_direction_unity_not_unlock_planet_ascend
                num_ascension_perk_slots >= 3 
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_unity_5_3_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_5_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_5_3_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_unity_5_3_enabled_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_unity_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_unity_5_3_selected
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_unity_5_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_campaign_is_enabled_tooltip
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_researcher_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_researcher_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_researcher_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_researcher_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_researcher_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_researcher_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_researcher_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_researcher_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_researcher_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_researcher_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_researcher_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_researcher_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_researcher_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }
