                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_researcher_2_2_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_researcher_2_2_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_2_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_2_2_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 2
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###physics###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_physics_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_physics_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_physics_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_physics_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_physics_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_physics_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_physics_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_physics_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_1_3_desc

                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {

                }
            }
        }

        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_physics_3_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_campaign_is_enabled_tooltip
        }
    }

###society###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_society_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_society_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_society_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_society_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_society_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_society_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_society_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_society_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_society_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_society_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_society_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_society_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_society_2_2_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_society_2_2_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_2_2_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###engineering###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_engineering_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_engineering_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_engineering_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_engineering_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_engineering_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_engineering_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_engineering_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_engineering_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_engineering_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_engineering_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_engineering_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_engineering_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_engineering_1_6_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_4_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_1_6_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 4
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_ship_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_ship_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_ship_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_ship_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_ship_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_ship_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_ship_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_ship_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_ship_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first

                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_ship_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_ship_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_ship_favored
                country_event = {

                }
            }

                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_ship_3_3_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_ship_3_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_unlock_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_3_3_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_ship_3_3_enabled_effect = {

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_army_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_army_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_army_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_army_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_army_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_army_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_army_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_army_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_army_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_army_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_army_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_army_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea

            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_2_4_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

###logistician###

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_main_botton = {
        potential = {
            always = yes
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_main_botton_favored = { #Same as above but with icon effects
        potential = {
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_favored
            }
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_botton_is_selected_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_main_botton_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_main_tooltip
            custom_tooltip = rls_already_favored
            hidden_effect = {
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.200
                }
                set_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
                set_country_flag = rls_direction_main_selected
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_favor_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected    
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_not_enough_execution_point
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_favored
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_already_favored
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_favored
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_take_interest
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_favor_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_logistician_favored
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.299
                }
            }
        }
    }

        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_4_2_enabled_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_4_2_selected
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_4_2_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_4_3_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
            
        }
        allow = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_4_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_blank
                leader = {
                    has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_4_2_selected
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_not_enough_idea_points
                leader = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                        value >= 3
                    }
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
                NOT = {
                    has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                }
            }
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_direction_is_enabled_tooltip
                NOT = {
                    leader = {
                        has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_4_3_selected
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        effect = {
            custom_tooltip = rls_direction_logistician_4_3_desc
            custom_tooltip = rls_spend_3_idea
            custom_tooltip = rls_click_to_select_tooltip
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = rls_4_3_selected
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_cost_idea_point_int
                    value = 3
                }
                country_event = {
                    id = play_as_ruler.300
                }
            }
        }
    }

    ruler_hobby_botton_rls_direction_logistician_4_3_enabled_effect = {
        potential = {
            has_country_flag = rls_main_logistician_selected
            leader = {
                has_leader_flag = rls_logistician_4_3_selected
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {

        }

            if = {
                limit = {

            }
        }
    }

##affair num

    ruler_rls_affair_level_num_0 = {
        potential = {
            exists = leader
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_affair_level
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
        allow = {
            
        }
        effect = {
            
        }
    }
    ruler_rls_affair_level_num_1 = {
        potential = {

##idea num spent

    ruler_rls_idea_level_spent_num_0 = {
        potential = {
            exists = leader

                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_level_spent

            exists = leader

    ruler_rls_idea_level_spent_num_2 = {

            exists = leader

###
ruler_rls_reset_level_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {

    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_reset_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = { #resetting spent skill point
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_spent
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_affair_level_spent
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_level_spent
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_spent
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_spent
                    value = 0
                }
    
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_eta
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_affair_level_eta
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_level_eta
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_eta
                    value = 0
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_eta
                    value = 0
                }
    
                set_variable = { #for skill point counting so it won't go above 100
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 100
                }
                subtract_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = rls_ruler_charm_level_int
                }
                set_variable = { #for skill point counting so it won't go above 100
                    which = rls_ruler_affair_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 100
                }
                subtract_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_affair_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = rls_ruler_affair_level_int
                }
                set_variable = { #for skill point counting so it won't go above 100
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 100
                }
                subtract_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = rls_ruler_idea_level_int
                }
                set_variable = { #for skill point counting so it won't go above 100
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 15
                }
                subtract_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = rls_ruler_execution_exp
                }
                set_variable = { #for skill point counting so it won't go above 100
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 15
                }
                subtract_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = rls_ruler_idea_exp
                }
                set_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
        
    }
}

ruler_rls_charm_level_plus_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_plus_botton
        leader = {
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_no_skill_point
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value >= 2
                }
            }
            
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_skill_point_cap_reached
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value > 0
                }
            }
            
        }
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_plus_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_eta
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_spent
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = 2
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = -2
                }
            }
        }
       
    }
}

ruler_rls_charm_level_minus_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_minus_botton
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = rls_no_spend_point
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_spent
                    value > 0
                }
            }
        }
        
        
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_minus_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_eta
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_spent
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = -2
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_charm_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = 2
                }
            }
        }
        
    }
}

ruler_rls_execution_exp_level_plus_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_execution_point_botton
        leader = {
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_no_skill_point
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value >= 5
                }
            }
            
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_skill_point_cap_reached
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value > 0
                }
            }
            
        }
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_execution_point_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_eta
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_spent
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = 5
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = -5
                }
            }
        }
       
    }
}

ruler_rls_execution_exp_level_minus_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_point_undo_botton
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = rls_no_spend_point
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_spent
                    value > 0
                }
            }
        }
        
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_point_undo_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_eta
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_spent
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = -5
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_execution_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = 5
                }
            }
        }
        
    }
}

ruler_rls_idea_exp_level_plus_botton = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_idea_point_botton
        leader = {
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_no_skill_point
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value >= 5
                }
            }
            
            custom_tooltip = {
                fail_text = rls_skill_point_cap_reached
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value > 0
                }
            }
            
        }
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_change_for_idea_point_botton
        hidden_effect = {
            leader = {
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_eta
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_spent
                    value = 1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_spent
                    value = 5
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_idea_exp_level_max_cap_for_skill_point
                    value = -1
                }
                change_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value = -5
                }
            }
        }
       
    }
}

ruler_rls_access_skill_point_window = {
    potential = {
        exists = leader
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_access_skill_point_ui
        custom_tooltip = play_as_ruler_show_available_skill_point
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_not_enough_skill_point
            leader = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = rls_ruler_skill_point_num
                    value >= 2
                }
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_open_from_foci_ui_first
            has_country_flag = ruler_hobby_view_opened
        }
    
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = rls_close_direction_window_first
            NOR = {
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.300.opened
                has_country_flag = play_as_ruler.303.opened
            }
        }
        custom_tooltip = {
            fail_text = play_as_ruler_just_spent_skill_point
            NOT = {
                has_country_flag = rls_ruler_just_spent_skill_point
            }
        }
        
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_access_skill_point_ui
        custom_tooltip = play_as_ruler_show_available_skill_point
        custom_tooltip = ruler_botton_rls_click_to_access
        hidden_effect = {
            country_event = {
                id = play_as_ruler.303
            }
        }
        
    }
}
